attributes.action: ensure only English born persons are represented on English £  Notes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Adam Smith is due to feature on the soon to be issued new £ 20 Notes.

He already features on the Scottish £ 50 Notes.

Smith was co-incidently born in Gordon Browns own constituency.

I would like to see all notes that have mass circulation in England to be issued with English born persons. I'm sure we have enough of them.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
